text: @GregAbbott_TX Who 👏🏻 are 👏🏻 you 👏🏻 testing?! And why do your testing #’s matter AT ALL if someone can literally be positive the next day?!?! 🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️ For the love of all that is holy just tell the blessed dang pony-faced TRUTH!! #Texas #COVID19 #testing #sentinelsurveillance #q #WWGIWGA
